Headline: Temporary Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Reroute near South Blvd/Ridgeland
ShortDescription:
Northbound 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via due to, 
 near South Blvd/Ridgeland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via South Blvd, Scoville, Lake, Ridgeland, and resume normal route due to street blockage near South Blvd/Ridgeland.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses are available between Fullerton and State/Lake to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
